H0.text: The massively popular Chinese website Taobao.com (10th busiest globally at 2013) operates in which sector. E-commerce platform

H1.text: The massively popular Chinese website Taobao.com (10th busiest globally at 2013) operates in which sector. Social media

H2.text: The massively popular Chinese website Taobao.com (10th busiest globally at 2013) operates in which sector. Online payment processing

H3.text: The massively popular Chinese website Taobao.com (10th busiest globally at 2013) operates in which sector. C2C shopping

A4.text: Taobao Marketplace facilitates consumer-to-consumer retail by providing a platform for small businesses and individual entrepreneurs to open online stores that mainly cater to consumers in Chinese-speaking regions (Mainland China, Hong Kong, Macau and Taiwan) and abroad, which is made payable by online accounts.

A5.text: Taobao's popular payment platform is Alibaba's Alipay.

A6.text: Taobao grew to become China's largest C2C online shopping platform

A7.text: Taobao introduced a spin-off, Taobao Mall (淘宝商城, later Tmall.com), an online retail platform to complement the Taobao C2C portal, offering global brands to an increasingly affluent Chinese consumer base
